Rumor has it that Roson - a master trapper from Crescentia - recently found an ancient relic with magical power.

However, no one knows the details. And what does that mean? That without any evidence, you shouldn't throw around phrases like "magical relic"!

So, you need to find out the truth. Talk to Roson and find out what this relic story is all about.

What? They say I have a magical relic? That's just ridiculous!

It always happens: people start gossiping without knowing the details and pass on rumors without bothering to verify them.

In reality, I only know the area where parts of the relic can be found. And one part alone has no value. You'll need to collect a bunch of them."But... for what?"

Recently, I heard a legend about relics of the ancient gods.

If you gather all parts of such a relic and restore it, you can create an amazing weapon that gains divine power! The avatar weapon."Sounds like... cheap nonsense."

Yes, I know. But all my research leads to this. That's why I'm hunting relics - I want to test my theory and see if it's true or false.

But finding them is really hard for me. I was never a good fighter, and the relic parts, unfortunately, are almost always found with monsters attracted by the energy they emit. I'm a researcher, you see...

But you, you're an experienced fighter, right? Maybe you... well... you know what I'm talking about? And you'll show me what you manage to find, won't you?

Did you manage to find anything? So it's true?

Could my theory be confirmed? I must know!"Here, take a look."

Oh, gods!.. This is incredible! What a magnificent greatsword... any adventurer's dream!

You've managed to confirm my theory! Thank you!

As a token of gratitude, I want to give this sword to you. In your hands, this weapon will be of greater use.

I believe there are other relics on the continent. I bet it won't be difficult for you to find them. Don't stop searching! And good luck on your future journeys.

Oh, no! You couldn't find them? Could my theory be wrong?

Please, keep searching! I really want to find proof that I'm right.
